.. redirect-from:: /citing

Citing Teacher
=================

If you use Teacher or its method to generate factual and counterfactual explanations
using fuzzy decision trees, please acknowledge this fact by citing `G. Fernandez, 
J. A. Aledo, J. A. Gamez and J. M. Puerta, "Factual and counterfactual explanations in 
fuzzy classification trees," in IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systems 
<https://doi.org/10.1109/TFUZZ.2022.3179582>`_

.. literalinclude:: ../../../../CITATION.bib
   :language: bibtex

.. container:: sphx-glr-download

   :download:`Download BibTeX bibliography file: CITATION.bib <../../../../CITATION.bib>`
